Table of Contents for current page

Button 按钮 #

基本用法 #

Button有颜色属性 type , 外形属性 circle 、 round , 可组合使用样式

<template>
  <div>
    <y-button>Default</y-button>
    <y-button type="primary">Primary</y-button>
    <y-button type="success">Success</y-button>
    <y-button type="info">Info</y-button>
    <y-button type="warning">Warning</y-button>
    <y-button type="danger">Danger</y-button>
  </div>
  <div>
    <y-button round>Default</y-button>
    <y-button type="primary" round>Primary</y-button>
    <y-button type="success" round>Success</y-button>
    <y-button type="info" round>Info</y-button>
    <y-button type="warning" round>Warning</y-button>
    <y-button type="danger" round>Danger</y-button>
  </div>
  <div>
    <y-button circle>√</y-button>
    <y-button type="primary" circle>√</y-button>
    <y-button type="success" circle>√</y-button>
    <y-button type="info" circle>√</y-button>
    <y-button type="warning" circle>√</y-button>
    <y-button type="danger" circle>√</y-button>
  </div>
</template>

<style lang="less" scoped>
div + div {
  margin-top: 12px;
}
</style>

禁用状态 #

你可以给Button传入 disabled 属性，值的类型为 Boolean ，来表示Button是否被禁用

<template>
  <div>
    <y-button disabled>Default</y-button>
    <y-button type="primary" disabled>Primary</y-button>
    <y-button type="success" disabled>Success</y-button>
    <y-button type="info" disabled>Info</y-button>
    <y-button type="warning" disabled>Warning</y-button>
    <y-button type="danger" disabled>Danger</y-button>
  </div>
</template>

Button尺寸 #

你可以选择传入 size 属性，有 small 和 large 两种尺寸可以选择。

<template>
  <div class="demo-row">
    <y-button type="primary" size="large">Large</y-button>
    <y-button type="primary">Default</y-button>
    <y-button type="primary" size="small">Small</y-button>
  </div>
  <div class="demo-row">
    <y-button type="primary" size="large" round>Large</y-button>
    <y-button type="primary" round>Default</y-button>
    <y-button type="primary" size="small" round>Small</y-button>
  </div>
</template>

Button API #

Button属性 #

属性名说明类型默认值
sizeButton尺寸'large' | 'default' | 'small''dafault'
typeButton类型'primary' | 'default' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'danger' | 'info''default'
round是否为圆角按钮booleanfalse
circle是否为圆形按钮booleanfalse
disabled是否为禁用状态booleanfalse
icon图标名称string——

Button插槽 #

插槽名说明
defaultButton自定义内容
icon自定义图标
